page.title: 09Home Life
page.content: On Sundays when I have had my breakfast I brush the dog Rusty and take him for a walk round the village.When I get back home I let him into the garden and give him a dog biscuit then I go and let the rabbit out for a while but I have to watch him to make sure that he doesn't eat the roses.Sometimes I go to the park or to the field with my friends.Some times we go for a walk down the hill to the railway and walk alongside it to the sports field where we walk round the track then we go through the wood and back home.I have to clean my bedroom and dust and polish and hoover up.I watch television in the evening or play a game with my mum.
